subdisciplines.name: 2D Animation
subdisciplines.description: The creation of motion graphics using two-dimensional techniques, including hand-drawn or computer-generated animation.

subdisciplines.name: 3D Animation
subdisciplines.description: The creation of motion graphics using three-dimensional techniques, including computer-generated images and models.

subdisciplines.name: Stop Motion Animation
subdisciplines.description: The creation of motion graphics using a series of still images, each slightly different from the preceding one.
